attributes.action: Re-build  Hadrians  wall  if  the  Scottish  National  party  win the Scottish Assembley  elections 2007  and they declare the  300 year  Union  over.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Re-build  Hadrians  wall  if  the  Scottish  National  Party  win the Scottish Assembley  elections 2007,  and they go on to declare the  300 year Act of  Union  over. Then re-introduce Passport  controls & road tolls heading south into North East England to  allow the safety upgrade of the A1  Berwick to Newcastle.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
